name: Hoam is Where you Hang your Hat
name_original: Hoam is Where you Hang your Hat
description:
Fourteen hats, one of them is the murderer. 

You play as the sheriff of a wild west town (called Hoam) populated by anthropomorphic hats; ask questions, make deductions, hang a hat.

HIWYHYH was created for the Global Game Jam (February 2019). The theme was "what does home mean to you?".

Click on hats with the left mouse button to have them talk. Click the hang button to hang someone (you only get one chance).

Hats are also initially transparent to help you keep track of who you have and haven't talked to (the game is supposed to be much easier if you make notes).
